186019353.review:
Men of War: Assault Squad 2: A Real-Time Strategy Classic with Modern Touches

Men of War: Assault Squad 2 is a real-time strategy game that harkens back to the classic RTS titles of the past, while incorporating modern touches.

What makes it stand out:

    Deep and Complex Gameplay: The game offers a high level of tactical depth. You have direct control over individual units, allowing for precise maneuvers and micro-management.
    Historically Accurate: The game features a wide range of historically accurate units and vehicles from World War II, adding to the immersion.
    Variety of Missions: The campaign offers a diverse range of missions, from large-scale battles to stealth operations and vehicle-focused scenarios.
    Modding Support: A strong modding community ensures a constant stream of new content and gameplay variations.

Minor Drawbacks:

    Steep Learning Curve: The game has a steep learning curve, especially for newcomers to the RTS genre. Mastering unit control and tactical nuances can take time.
    Can be Demanding: The game can be demanding on system resources, especially on higher settings.

Overall: Men of War: Assault Squad 2 is a challenging but rewarding RTS experience. It offers a deep and engaging gameplay experience for fans of the genre, with a focus on historical accuracy and tactical depth.

Recommendation: Highly recommended for fans of classic RTS games like Company of Heroes and those who enjoy a challenging and rewarding strategic experience.

Men of War: Assault Squad 2 es, sin duda, uno de los mejores juegos ambientados en la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Con una comunidad de mods increíblemente dedicada, ofrece posibilidades casi infinitas para personalizar tu experiencia. He pasado incontables horas jugando misiones variadas e intentando recrear las grandes batallas de este conflicto histórico.

Si eres un apasionado de la historia militar, disfrutas la acción intensa y te encantan los juegos de estrategia en tiempo real (RTS), este título es imprescindible. Su profundidad táctica y atención al detalle hacen que cada partida sea única y emocionante.

185283294.review:
Men of War: Assault Squad 2 to wyjątkowa strategia czasu rzeczywistego, która zabiera graczy na fronty II wojny światowej. Produkcja oferuje intensywną rozgrywkę z naciskiem na taktykę i zarządzanie zasobami. Kampanie, zarówno solo, jak i w trybie kooperacji, pozwalają wcielić się w dowódców różnych armii, oferując zróżnicowane misje od oblężeń po ciche akcje sabotażowe.

Największym atutem gry jest wysoki poziom realizmu, precyzyjne odwzorowanie jednostek i ich możliwości, a także zaawansowana sztuczna inteligencja przeciwników. System bezpośredniej kontroli jednostek wyróżnia tę grę na tle innych strategii, dając poczucie pełnej kontroli nad polem bitwy.

Oprawa audiowizualna może nie zachwycać, ale nadrabia atmosferą i szczegółowością. Gra sprawdzi się szczególnie wśród fanów strategii, którzy szukają wyzwania i satysfakcji z dobrze zaplanowanych działań.

Если так подумать игра хорошая. НО. Всегда есть "НО" .  Конченая кампания где тупо скучно бегать по точкам или всё время сидеть в обороне . Стелс мисии ещё +- но все однотипны. Что касательно ДЛС. ДЛС это ПИ*3DEЦ, отдай деньги в пустую что бы получить кампания 10 летней давности , отдай деньги что бы получить целую нацию с гейскими юнитами. 
МОДЫ = +1500 дней которые ты потратиш на их освоение  прохождение мисий . Зачастую мододелы ленивы , но выдают годноту . Могу порекминдавть следуищее моды: Multiplayer 1.3.0 (TOP), Cold War 1.7.5 , Vietnam 1965 , Robz . 
МП. Мультиплеер умирает с каждым днём , обнов уже не видали xep пойми сколько времени .

184516395.review:
A Great RTS for all libarys                                                                                                                                                        Men of War: Assault Squad 2 suffers from being a small step forwards from the first. If you haven't played the first of the Assualt Squads I have no hesitation recommending this for purchase if you have an interest in a deep WW2 real time strategy. Particularly if you played the earlier MoW and want a bit more then you won't be disappointed.

For those that haven't played any of the series MoW is an extremely deep RTS, each of your units has an inventory containing their weapons, ammo and equipment (including hat). Each of these units can also be controlled directly by you at any moment. This makes for glorious moments where you crawl a single man with TNT up behind a enemy Tiger and blow it to kingdom come, or your single tank goes on a rampage causing chaos everywhere. In addition to inventories and direct control there are a bunch of game mechanics to consider, the cover system and terrain is essential to keeping the squishy bits on the inside of your man shaped meat sacks. The ballistics and penetration mechanics are supremely important to tanks, angle your armour and more shots will bounce, shoot through buildings and your rounds will lose kinetic energy. Oh and you can destroy pretty much any structure if you fancy it.

The problem arises when contemplating a step up from the first Assault Squad. At first glance it doesn't appear like there is that much of a difference, it looks and plays very much like the first one with a few interface tweaks and improved graphics. Many of the improvements over the first are "behind the scenes" such as improved kill count mechanics and multiplayer functionality. The major game changer is the steam integration, massively increasing the availability of content and (most of the time) the ease with which you can play it. Sure the quality of a scenario or map will vary but there are good ones out there and reviews and comments make it reasonably easy to find them.

The new content is solid if a bit uninspiring, but new units and fixes are being dripfed into the game and what was a bit of a disappointing release in the beginning is getting nicely rounded out. So if you can get this at a discount then do it and check out the workshop, if you want a first time foray into the series then this is the one to get, the depth of the MoW series can not be oversold and when you get it, it is a thing of beauty. It should probably be mentioned most of my experiences are through co-op to give some kind of perspective. PvP is tense, painful, frustrating and beautifully rewarding in equal measure.

184298353.review:
游戏的画面表现可圈可点，战场上的硝烟弥漫、建筑的损毁以及士兵和武器装备的细节都展现得较为细腻，能让玩家身临其境地感受到战争的紧张氛围。物理效果也相当出色，子弹的弹道、爆炸的冲击力等都模拟得较为真实，增加了战斗的沉浸感。
 
玩法上，它继承了系列传统并加以优化。玩家可操控来自不同阵营的多种单位，每个单位都有其独特的技能和装备，这就需要玩家根据实际情况灵活制定战术。比如在一场城市巷战中，合理利用步兵的掩护射击与坦克的火力支援相配合，才能有效地推进战线。而且游戏的难度曲线设计较为合理，新手玩家可以从基础的战役任务入手，逐步熟悉游戏机制，而老手则能在高难度关卡和对战模式中迎接挑战，充分展现自己的策略技巧。
 
不过，游戏也存在一些小瑕疵。偶尔会出现 AI 队友的行动逻辑不够智能的情况，比如在激烈交火时，部分队友可能会做出不合理的冲锋或站位选择，影响整体战斗布局。此外，游戏的优化方面还有一定提升空间，在大规模战斗场景下，可能会出现卡顿现象，对玩家的游戏体验产生一定干扰。
 
总体而言，men of war凭借其扎实的游戏内容和独特的二战题材魅力，在即时战略游戏领域中占据一席之地，对于喜欢策略战争游戏的玩家来说，是一款值得尝试和深入体验的佳作，尽管存在一些小缺点,但仍然是最好玩的RTS二战军事模拟游戏

183641194.review: Despite the age and questionable practices of the developers, it's a very enjoyable RTS experience. The ability to control each units and instruct them in many ways, that even a singular soldier can be impactful in the battlefield. I just wished there were more single-player campaigns featuring other nations. Fortunately, kind modders have transformed the game into completely different settings and extend the replayability into countless hours. Although there are other options now such as GoH and the sequel, this piece will remain in my heart.

183590644.review:
One of the hidden gems in the RTS genre, and by now probably one of the best.
The campaigns are... mid. They all feel the same; only the maps and units change.
The graphics are suitable for what they need to be.
The gameplay, however, is outstanding for an RTS.
Overall, it's a great experience, and I would definitely recommend it.
